mapper.select: SELECT postNo, postSubtitle, postTitle, postContent, postUpcount, postViewcount, DATE_FORMAT(postRegdate, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%m:%s') AS postRegdate, postNoti, p.userNo, nickname, blockUserflag, outUserflag FROM post p INNER JOIN user u ON p.userNo = u.userNo WHERE PostNo = #{postNo};

postSubtitle LIKE concat('%', #{postSubtitle}, '%')
